introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Global Goods Atlas, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you register for an account, create or modify your profile, sign up for our newsletter, or otherwise communicate with us.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience and collect information about visitors and visits to our website. We explain how we use cookies and similar technologies in our Cookie Policy.

types.name: Essential cookies
types.description: Necessary for the website to function properly.

types.name: Analytics cookies
types.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

types.name: Preference cookies
types.description: Enable the website to remember information that changes the way it behaves or looks.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
purposes: To provide and maintain our Service
To notify you about changes to our Service
To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service
To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service
To monitor the usage of our Service
To detect, prevent and address technical issues

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent users' personal identification information to others. We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers.

thirdParties.name: Service providers
thirdParties.purpose: To perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, data analysis, and customer service

thirdParties.name: Research partners
thirdParties.purpose: For anonymized data analysis and research purposes

thirdParties.name: Legal requirements
thirdParties.purpose: To comply with applicable law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, please also remember that we cannot guarantee that the internet itself is 100% secure.

userRights.title: Your Rights

rights.name: Access
rights.description: You have the right to request copies of your personal data.

rights.name: Rectification
rights.description: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate.

rights.name: Erasure
rights.description: You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

rights.name: Restrict processing
rights.description: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

rights.name: Object to processing
rights.description: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

rights.name: Data portability
rights.description: You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

userRights.contact: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
